page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: The majority of the population in this area are Roman Catholic. The other main demoninations are Anglican (Church of Ireland) and Presybeterian. The parish is called the parish of 'Bright' for all religions. The non_catholic population of the area has declined and the Church of Ireland now share their Minister with the surrounding parishes of Ardglass and Strangford. The Roman Catholic population have three churches in the parish, none of which are situated in the area (one in Killough; Legamaddy; Rossglass). The church of Ireland at Bright is a very interesting building as in it was held the first Sunday School in Ireland.
